document.full_text: japanese automaker honda motor co has "adequate inventory" of most models for the u.s. market but is running short of its high-volume compact civic just as the summer sales season begins, the company told honda and acura dealers in a letter on thursday.
document.title: honda says u.s. vehicle supply to improve by july
lines_and_colors: japanese automaker honda motor co has "adequate inventory" of most models for the u.s. market but is running short of its high-volume compact civic just as the summer sales season begins, the company told honda and acura dealers in a letter on thursday.
